field.path_desc: Describe the equipment path from the entry point of the building to the safe’s final stored location
field.stairs_required: Are stairs required on the path?
field.stairs_count: How many stairs on the path?
field.has_ethernet: Is Ethernet available at the install location?
field.days_prior: How many days prior to installation can the safe be delivered?
field.storage_space: Is there space to store the safe after delivery until it is installed?
field.storage_space_where: If yes, where will the safe be stored?
field.delivery_loc_other_desc: If other, describe the delivery location.
field.staircase_notes: Describe door sizes, staircases (steps, turns, landings), etc.
field.storage_floor_number: What floor number is the safe to be stored on?
field.storage_path_steps: Are there steps on the path to the storage location?
field.storage_path_stairs: Are there stairs on the path to the storage location?
field.storage_path_ramps: Are there ramps on the path to the storage location?
field.elevator_available: Is there an elevator that can be used for delivery?
field.elevator_dimensions: Elevator interior dimensions (length x width x height)
field.lift_gate_required: If there is no loading dock, will the delivery truck need a lift gate?
field.delivery_floor_desc: Describe the flooring along the delivery path.
field.delivery_weight_restrictions: Are there any weight restrictions to moving the safe along the delivery path?
field.delivery_method_pallet_jack: Can a pallet jack be used to move the safe on the delivery path?
field.delivery_method_dolly: Can a dolly be used to move the safe on the delivery path?
field.delivery_method_hand_truck: Can a hand truck be used to move the safe on the delivery path?
field.min_door_width: What is the minimum door width for delivery?
field.delivery_path_photos: Have you attached photos of the delivery path?
field.door_size: What is the smallest door size to get the safe from its stored location to the install location?
field.room_size: What is the room size (length, width, and height)?
field.sufficient_space: Is there sufficient space for the safe? (Minimum required space: Height 30 in, Width 16 in, Length 30 in)
field.other_safe: Is there any existing safe that will interfere with the Tidel safe’s operation?
field.safe_type: If there is an existing safe, describe it and its location.
field.safe_to_remove: Is there any existing safe that must be removed to make room for the Tidel safe?
field.network: Is there a nearby network jack for an Ethernet connection (if required)?
field.network_distance: If yes, how far is the network jack from the safe installation location?
field.water_distance: Will the safe be installed 6 feet away from a water source?
field.power: Are there at least 2 power outlets available within 6 feet of the safe?
field.install_notes: Describe the installation area and add any additional notes or observations. Reference any photos taken.
field.storage_to_install_distance: How far is the safe stored from the installation location?
field.storage_different_floor: Is the safe stored on a different floor number?
field.install_path_steps: Are there steps on the path from the stored location to the installation location?
field.install_path_stairs: Are there stairs on the path from the stored location to the installation location?
field.install_path_ramps: Are there ramps on the path from the stored location to the installation location?
field.install_move_sliding: Can the safe be slid by hand to the installation location?
field.install_move_pallet_jack: Can a pallet jack be used to move the safe to the installation location?
field.install_move_dolly: Can a dolly be used to move the safe to the installation location?
field.install_move_hand_truck: Can a hand truck be used to move the safe to the installation location?
field.install_near_heaters: Will the safe be installed near any heaters or radiators?
field.drilling_restrictions: Are there any restrictions to drilling into the floor?
field.drilling_restrictions_details: If there are restrictions to drilling or a Floor Scan is required, describe them.
field.embedded_power_line: Are there any embedded power lines in the floor?
field.embedded_water_pipe: Are there any embedded water pipes in the floor?
field.embedded_sewer_pipe: Are there any embedded sewer pipes in the floor?
field.drilling_before_open: Must drilling be done before the store opens?
field.drilling_during_hours: Can drilling be done during regular business hours?
